name: programs
title: Programs
description: I make Programs. Program is series of coded software instructions to control the operation of a computer or other machine

name: games
title: Games
description: I make Video Games. Video Game is game played by electronically manipulating images produced by a computer program on a television screen or other display screen

name: audio
title: Audio
description: I make Audio and Music. Audio is sound, especially when recorded, transmitted, or reproduced. Music is vocal or instrumental sounds (or both) combined in such a way as to produce beauty of form, harmony, and expression of emotion

name: videos
title: Videos
description: I make Videos. Video is recording, reproducing, or broadcasting of moving visual images

name: images
title: Images
description: I make Images. Image is representation of the external form of a person or thing in art

name: documents
title: Documents
description: I make Documents. Document is piece of written, printed, or electronic matter that provides information or evidence or that serves as an official record
